title: Crime Alert 11.02.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 11.02.18
description:
Solider murders wife, then takes girlfriend and her kids to dump the body. Attack against journalist Jamal Khashoggi was premeditated.   Woman slits the throat of her 70 year old neighbor.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
